thread.title: Star Wars Celebration Poster Revealed, Plus 40th Anniversary Panel
thread.title_full: Star Wars Celebration Poster Revealed, Plus 40th Anniversary Panel

author: Spencer Perry
title: Star Wars Celebration Poster Revealed, Plus 40th Anniversary Panel
text:
SHARE Star Wars Celebration poster revealed, plus 40th Anniversary panel 
It has been announced today that this year’s Star Wars Celebration will officially kick off on Thursday, April 13 with a Star Wars 40th Anniversary panel, set to feature Lucasfilm president Kathleen Kennedy and discussions with some of the saga’s brightest stars. It promises to highlight the impact of the galaxy far, far away and the fandom that has propelled it for the last four decades; this marquee Celebration event will undoubtedly include many not-to-be-missed surprises… 
In addition, the official poster for this year’s event has been revealed, combining the three generations of Star Wars all into one place. Check it out in the gallery below! 
RELATED: Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson Confirmed for Star Wars Celebration 2017 
Star Wars Celebration 2017 takes place in Orlando, Florida from April 13-16, 2017, at the Orange County Convention Center. Other previously-announced guests for the event include Felicity Jones (   ), Ian McDiarmid (Emperor Palpatine), and Jeremy Bulloch (Boba Fett), who will all be signing at the Star Wars Celebration Autograph Hall. 
Lucasfilm also previously confirmed that Warwick Davis will return to panel-hosting duties for the event. You can check out all of the badges for the event below and secure your tickets by clicking here ! 
What are you hoping to see at Star Wars Celebration 2017? Sound off below!
